name: Anatomic Pathology Patient Interest Association
goal: The Anatomical Pathology Patient Interest Association (APPIA) is a not-for-profit membership organization focused on advancing patient safety, quality, standards, and accessibility of care in anatomic pathology.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Invitro diagnostic regulation (IVDR), ISO standards, disease guidelines and standards.
